reviewText: Used this for Read Across America day. Worked great.
good but not exactly fun for the little ones
Kids love the stories of both Duke Ellington and Ella Fitzgerald. The pictures are beautifully done and hold their attention.
Excellent product.  Enjoyable for all generations!!! Even adults can benefit from this articulately, dramatized version! Love it!
This will work quite well in my various aged classrooms. I enjoy having the books on a DVD to review as well.  Thank you.

I used this video for a unit I was doing on historical african american figures.  It was a great addition to my catalog.  As always, Scholastic does not disappoint.  This video held my students' interest and kept them wanting to learn more.

I teach spec. needs students. I hate that term, but it is the new "PC" name for them. My students thoroughly enjoy learning about our African American Heritage. I have students of all races and they all loved the music. You can teach through love, admiration, and respect. That goes for the teacher, the students, and the subject.
